Не пришло подтверждение? Отправить повторно.

Если у вас нет учетной записи, то вам необходимо зарегистрироваться.

After passing the registration procedure with the Service, the User is solely responsible for protecting the confidentiality of the user's registration data, including password and user account, as well as responsibility for all actions that are performed under it. All actions performed using the user's registration data are considered to be committed by the user. By using the services of Ledbiocoin, the User undertakes to immediately notify the representatives of Ledbiocoin of any unauthorized use of the User's password and account, as well as any breach of security. The Ledbiocoin command is not responsible and cannot be responsible for any damage or loss caused by inaccuracies in the information provided by the User or inability of the User to provide password protection. The User may at any time terminate the use of the Services. The User understands and agrees that the Ledbiocoin Team may, at any time and for any reason, including the period of inactivity of the User's account, terminate the access to the Services, terminate this Agreement, as well as suspend or terminate the User's account, unless otherwise provided by additional written agreements between the user and Ledbiocoin signed by authorized persons.
